welcome_benefits: 10% Cashback on First Five UPI Spends

Reward Redemption: Redeem for Vouchers and Other Options

product_details: This floater card is available on the RuPay variant and can be easily linked to UPI apps.
Earn 1 Reward Point on each spend of ₹200 with this card.
The Federal Wave Card offers 1,000 bonus reward points on quarterly spends of ₹50,000.
This card comes with a shared limit (other existing Federal Cards).
